SYSTEM: 20200423_EOSC.pdf: Página 18
Open Science Update
Open Science project at UPM
Funded under “Programa Propio UPM 2020”. 80K€
Promoters:
o Oscar Corcho (EOSC FAIR WG, Open software/data)
o Mark Wilkinson (FAIR data)
o Carlos del Cañizo (Responsible Research and Innovation)
o Ana Laverón (ESA Scientific Data)
o Raquel Cedazo (Citizen Science)
o Alberto Brunete (Open hardware)
Open to the UPM community:
o Central library, school libraries and CESVIMA
o Strategic actions at UPM
o Open Science ambassadors and support team
Whom?
o Esteban González: 31 months part-time (50%)
o Paco Yedro: 12 months part-time (40%)
